feature.label: Library Architecture and Framework (Target Content)
feature.description: This version of Library Architecture and Framework Target Content can be chosen separately for each C/C++ project via their project settings. The Library Architecture and Framework IDE Client, on the other hand, is common to all projects and its version must be equal to or greater than the version of this Target Content feature.
feature.license: Released under Texas Instruments Incorporated - Technology Software Publicly Available license.
